nodes.text: Skreen was an author and the technical director of the Manifold Mollusk Matrix and Matrimony Association from Lusaanda. Skreen was a member of the Gaalt Sky Rowing team and also wrote Destiny Days, planning three sequels sometime later.
He once took part in a seminar with other eminent figures such as mOKDAR 15, Kaat Thrick-Thrick, Aanxi Raanxi Laanxi and 26-424.

Skreen was featured in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
The illustration of Skreen is also used for the customs officer in the Star Wars Legends adventure book Tatooine Manhunt.
